headline: $65.9 Million Net-Leased Portfolio 70 DST Fully Subscribed, Strengthening ExchangeRight's Essential Income REIT Pipeline
summary: PASADENA, Calif., December 16, 2025--ExchangeRight has announced the full subscription of Net-Leased Portfolio 70 DST, reflecting continued demand for the company’s historically recession-resilient net-leased offerings that support the growing acquisition pipeline of ExchangeRight’s Essential Income REIT. The $65.89 million portfolio of net-leased real estate, backed by primarily investment-grade companies operating in necessity-based industries, provides investors with monthly distributions at

thumbnail.caption: PASADENA, Calif. — Tenants occupying properties in ExchangeRight's Net-Leased Portfolio 70 DST, a closed offering that is not accepting new investors (Tuesday, December 16, 2025).
